# reactionType

**Instance Property**

The type of reaction.

## Declaration

```swift
var reactionType: AVCaptureReactionType { get }
```

## Discussion

There may be multiple reactions of the same type at a given time. Some may come from calls to [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureDevice/performEffect(for:)] and others from gesture detection.

## Configuring the effect state

- **AVCaptureReactionType**: Constants that indicate the type of reaction that an effect can perform.
- **startTime**: The presentation time of the first frame where the system renders the effect.
- **endTime**: The presentation time of the first frame following the end of a reaction effect.
